alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 28 at 6:23PM MDT until July 28 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Colorado, including the following area, Eastern Las Animas County. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Monsoon moisture and upslope flow will trigger showers and thunderstorms across the southeast plains into the overnight hours. Very heavy rainfall will be possible which could cause localized flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
